website_summaries.verdict: There’s no better way to see exactly what Minecraft is capable of than with the Master Collection’s exclusive African animals, pastel characters, and pirate adventures.
pros: Core Minecraft game plus the Creator’s Pack of fan-made remixed game assets, Starter Pack, and 1,000 Minecoins
Available on Xbox One and Windows
cons: The additional content makes this the most expensive version of Minecraft available

customer_reviews.title: extras will only go to one family member
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for my family of 3 boys to share. The Master addition is the one that they wanted so they didn't have to pay for extras and add-ons like on the original Minecraft for xbox one. The game comes with a card with free upgrade codes onit to add special "skins and $" to your profile, But it only loads to one persons profile, which makes it not fair in our household. The boys say it still is better than the regular edition, with extras and all, but just that one thing so far
customer_reviews.author: tamgau

customer_reviews.title: Okay bundle
customer_reviews.text: Game is good and included add ons are fun and interesting. However, unlike most DLC on other games that can be played individually by everyone on the console, only the person who enters the promo codes can start a game in the extra scenarios. Other players on console may join via multiplayer, but cannot use anything but base game themselves.
customer_reviews.author: August B.

customer_reviews.title: Timeless simplicity
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son is hooked on Minecraft, like many kids are. We play together maybe 4 hours a week, it is a great bonding experience. Although I play to bond with him, I thoroughly enjoy the experience. I could play by myself and still enjoy it, to be completely honest. The game is very simple but the open world, sandbox experience means there is many things you can do. Creative mode gives you the option to literally do whatever you want from a building perspective. Survival mode adds a bit of realism and challenge to it, you have to harvest resources, survive through the night mobs, etc, etc...
customer_reviews.author: E. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I’m super angry about this game. Only three of the skins loaded. The Minecoins and other skins didn’t. I called X-Box and they said there’s nothing they can do, that it’s a developer issue. So I emailed the developer and haven’t heard back. I’m super angry because it’s a total waste of money. Upon researching further it seems a very typical issue and the developer doesn’t respond to people or fix the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this version of MINECRAFT!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful edition of this game! I'm so pleased with this. The order came very quickly too. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Can’t apply redeemed codes to game. Problem with Mojang
customer_reviews.text: I redeemed the 3 codes that came with the game for my daughter correctly and none of the content is being applied to the game. I’ve spent the past hour trying to figure out what the problem is. I’m signed into the correct accounts and followed the instructions perfectly. Speaking to someone with Microsoft is damn near impossible. I finally was able to navigate through Microsoft’s maze from hell to speak with someone and they say it’s an ongoing issue with Minecraft and I need to speak with Mojang to resolve the issue. I’ve spent more time on this problem than the game is worth, which is why I’m giving this 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Kids Just Love It
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons Still Love It, 2 months after I gave it to 'em! And STILL Do, after 10 months!
customer_reviews.author: Torretto

customer_reviews.title: Absolute scam!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute waste of money and time, thought I’d surprise my son with this game for Christmas and it doesn’t even work...the disc can’t be read, the “support” line for the game is just a recording that tells you to refer to their site which then sends you to a page to buy new games because no one wants to do their job and actually fix issues they created. And even worse...no refund!!! Brand new game, doesn’t work, no replacement, and no refund. Absolute scam!!
customer_reviews.author: StellaPC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pricing
customer_reviews.text: Value price. This online purchase works to eliminate brick and mortar shopping
customer_reviews.author: Pappy

customer_reviews.title: He loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this game for his birthday. He is 9, he was pleased that it artist quickly and he loves the game.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Brainwashing
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't have any ideal if it is any good. I don't like video games and I think they are part of the downfall of society. My grandson wanted it for Christmas so I got it for him.
customer_reviews.author: Batman 68

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt allow 2 player with out paying!
customer_reviews.text: Greedy ass xbox. Can't even play 2 player with out paying ... $500 for an xbox and still have to pay a monthy so my kids can play together... lame
customer_reviews.author: Christy Eads

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this game. 4 starts because not all worlds loaded with included code as noted, we will have to call help line to figure it out, kind of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: PDX Mama

customer_reviews.title: Son loves his game!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old. He loves the 'extras'. The game was on sale and was actually about $10 less than what some other places were charging.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Rodwell

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love this game
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas present and the grandkids play it all the time. I would recommend this supplier. Also, it came earlier that expected.
customer_reviews.author: B. Adleman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: It’s the Minecraft game. Other than that there isn’t much to say. You get the disc and a case. If you don’t know what Minecraft is you should try it online before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Brutally Honest

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for game-pass play issues
customer_reviews.text: Its great, the extras are nice, got it to fix the gamepass vrs freezing!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Not sure , great graphics and nice story line.
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I got the game for my granddaughter to play and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Hyneman

customer_reviews.title: Codes dont work waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Redemption codes did not work my son was very upset too late to return.

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for those enjoy MC
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 10 yr niece. She loves it and plays it all the time

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: My grandson 8 years of age loves this game. I love that he uses his imagination with this game
customer_reviews.author: Myrtle Banks

customer_reviews.title: A clever RIP off
customer_reviews.text: This game just quit working. Quite expensive for a master collection to only work for a few months and of course it's no longer Amazon's problem since returns must happen within 30 days. This sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun extras
customer_reviews.text: Lots of great add one and as always a hun game
customer_reviews.author: blindbro

customer_reviews.title: my bad!
customer_reviews.text: Didnt realize this did not come in a case, as we purchased it for a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Item was delivered on time before Easter!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived on time before Easter! My grandson was so happy he received this game and loves it. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Lucignano

customer_reviews.title: Does this have E3?
customer_reviews.text: I like the severs and every thing, but Is there the E3 or 4K?
customer_reviews.author: brian dooley

product_meta.title: Minecraft Master Collection - Xbox One
product_meta.description: Create. Explore. Survive. Create anything you can imagine. Explore the mighty mountains and living Ocean of Infinite worlds, expanded further by free game updates, amazing community-made maps, servers, thrilling mini games and more! survive online with friends on Console, mobile, and Windows 10, or Share the adventure at home in split-screen multiplayer. This collection Includes the Minecraft base game, 1000 mine coins, Starter Pack DLC and creators Pack DLC. This collection Includes the Minecraft base game, 1000 mine coins, and an amazing selection of the most popular Mash-up, Texture packs, skin packs and other fun content from the Minecraft marketplace. 1, 000 mine coins. Use them to get maps, Skins, textures packs and more from the in-game marketplace! Starter Pack: Greek Mythology Mash-up, plastic Texture Pack, skin Pack 1, and villains skin Pack. Creators Pack: adventurer's dream Mash-up and Winter mini-games Festival by NOx crew, relics of the privateers by imaginers, purebdcraft Texture Pack by draft, pastel skin Pack by emerita, and wildlife: savanna by Pixel he a DS. System requirement minimum your device must meet all minimum requirements to open this product OS Xbox One, Windows 10 version 14393.0 or higher, architecturex64. Entertainment Software Rating Board (ESRB) Content Description: Fantasy violence.
feature_bullets: This collection includes: the Minecraft base game, 1000 mine coins and the Starter Pack DLC an amazing selection of mash-ups, texture packs, Skin packs and other fun content to discover
Create your very own world and build to the limits of your Imagination
Explore mighty mountains and living ocean of Infinite worlds, amazing community-made maps, servers, thrilling minicamps and more!
Survive online with friends who are on Console, mobile, and Windows 10, or share the adventure at home in split-screen multiplayer
